title: Escape from Tarkov: Arena
description: Escape from Tarkov: Arena is a tactical shooter with high level of realism, where skill and teamwork are key. There are no arcade simplifications here ‚Äì dynamic, hardcore PvP battles with detailed weapon mechanics and ballistics that demand mastery and refined instincts
longDescription:
<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# Welcome to Arena, rebyata!
<!--text-->
Escape from Tarkov: Arena combines the hardcore mechanics of Escape from Tarkov and fast-paced gameplay of session matches, offering players a new perspective on the Tarkov universe.

‚ÄúThe city of Tarkov is overrun with chaos. While corporations and private military companies wage their war in the streets, a mysterious group, the Masters of Arena, led by Ref, operate in the shadows. They have created clandestine fighting grounds where the best warriors battle for glory, money, and survival.‚Äù

You are an Arena gladiator. Will you become the next legend?

üîπ Tactical team matches and free for all gunfights
üîπ Realistic weapon and health mechanics
üîπ Variety of arenas with unique combat conditions
üîπ 200+ weapons and hundreds of attachments from Escape from Tarkov
üîπ Ranked game modes and Esports tournaments

<!--image-->
![Escape from Tarkov: Arena-372ky](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/eb7eff84d8ba4b3e8d512589c5048187/escape-from-tarkov-arena-372ky.png)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# Make the weapon a part of you
<!--text-->
Create your perfect build from 200+ guns and hundreds of accessories. The entire arsenal of weapons, from old classics to uniques, which has been created over the years in Escape from Tarkov, is now at your disposal - customize it down to the smallest detail.

üîπ Scopes, suppressors, grips, and more
üîπ Adjust recoil, penetration and ergonomics to your liking
üîπ Simulation of real weapon behavior
üîπ Wide selection of body armor, helmets, combat stimulants and ballistic plates

<!--image-->
![Escape from Tarkov: Arena-13qtt](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/eb7eff84d8ba4b3e8d512589c5048187/escape-from-tarkov-arena-13qtt.png)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# Test your skills on the Arena
<!--text-->
Test yourself in diverse Arena game modes. Experiment and win!

- Last Hero: a classic Free for All style respawn game mode where each player is on their own and aims to become the winner by scoring the most points in the allotted time.
- BlastGang: a 5v5 Search and Destroy style game mode where one team must plant the device while the other team must stop them at all costs or deactivate the planted device.
- TeamFight: a 5v5 game mode where both teams have to either eliminate the opponents in the allotted time or capture the objectives in the overtime.
- CheckPoint: a 5v5 Domination style respawn game mode where the teams must capture and hold the objectives to take full control of the map.

<!--image-->
![Escape from Tarkov: Arena-bqqrm](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/eb7eff84d8ba4b3e8d512589c5048187/escape-from-tarkov-arena-bqqrm.png)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# Become the legend of the Arena
<!--text-->
Alone, you can survive. In a team, you can win.

Your success in battles depends not only on well-built weapons and equipment, but also on your allies. Gather a squad of trusted comrades, develop tactics, and defeat the enemy's strategy. Become the most experienced and dangerous fighter in the Arena!
Participate in ranked games and become a legendary Arena gladiator. Test your skills in the tournaments or watch the best of the best on the Arena Cup Series professional league broadcasts.

<!--image-->
![Escape from Tarkov: Arena-16a38](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/eb7eff84d8ba4b3e8d512589c5048187/escape-from-tarkov-arena-16a38.png)
